singlefamily22.description: A complete remodel was taken down to the studs in 2016. Now has approved Plans to add an additional 1198 sqft to this Private Estate making the main house 3500 plus a casita of 450 sqft (5 bed 7 bath), with whitewater, Catalina, and city light views. Currently, a 4 bedroom 4 1/2 bath Laguna Beach home has views and privacy with walkability to the village. Carefully designed Transitional Beach Craftsman home with 500 square foot legal casita across the courtyard with full kitchen, washer, and dryer.  Smooth stucco white finish, Italian Tile, Epi Decking, outdoor hot and cold shower, our door fire pit and barbecue,  beamed and boxed ceilings, copper trim gutters, and caps, impressive attention to detail. Open concept main level includes 180-degree views, gourmet kitchen with Viking and SubZero appliances, walk in pantry, Carrera and Bardiglio marble counters, custom cabinets, all wood clad pass-through windows & bi-fold doors open to ocean view terraces, 3 washer and dryer stations.  All 4 bedrooms have private baths. Master bedroom has stunning views 180-degree views, fireplace, walk-in closet, rain shower & washer and dryer.  Walk to The Village, fine dining, galleries, shopping, festivals & world-class beaches. Truly one of the finest homes on the market.  Purchase before construction starts or buy after construction is completed at a much higher price. (Make sure to view the 3-d Tour) .

Live Auction! Bidding to start from $800,000! 1595 Arroyo Drive is a charming bungalow-style cottage located in the desirable canyon area of Laguna Beach. Boasting a 7,500 sqft lot, this is the best-priced single-family home in Laguna Beach. The property backs up to a nature reserve providing a peaceful and serene setting for nature lovers. The street is a quiet cul-de-sac with lots of potential for expansion or an accessory dwelling unit. The home has a large one-car garage and an additional three parking spaces, as well as plenty of visitor parking on the street. The home's 800 sqft floor plan includes 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The property also features a private backyard, perfect for an artist's retreat or an escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. This cozy home offers the perfect blend of location, style and potential. The property boasts an excellent location, just a short walk from the town's restaurants, Main beach, and a huge nature reserve with trails. The property is also close to world-renowned art festivals and galleries, such as the Sawdust Art Festival and the Pageant of The Masters. This is a rare opportunity to own a piece of Laguna Beach, a world-class destination. Don't miss out on the chance to make this charming cottage your own.

Experience warmth, nature and tranquility. Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac in a serene setting, this single-story cedar home with ocean views on an oversize lot has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths. The property features aesthetic architecture with high vaulted ceilings, ceiling to floor windows with sunlight streaming in and stunning views of sunrises and sunsets. The chef in you will delight in the updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops and designer cabinetry. The primary suite opens to a private deck overlooking the picturesque hillsides, and two secondary bedrooms offer room for family and guests. Beautifully landscaped front and back yards are wonderful for outdoor entertaining, creative gardening or just enjoying some peaceful relaxation. Direct access to the house is convenient from an oversized two car garage that is well suited for storage and work areas. Two additional spaces in the driveway provide plenty of parking. Just moments away are Laguna’s renowned beaches, shopping, restaurants, hiking trails, mountain biking and award-winning schools.

Commanding a coveted front row position at the world-famous Montage Laguna Beach Resort with incredible ocean views, this undeniably impressive contemporary estate defines luxury living. Remodeled in 2022, this world-class custom home is a masterpiece of craftsmanship featuring only the finest materials throughout. Its dramatic yet inviting decor delivers both serene comfort and opulent style, with countless spaces designed for indoor-outdoor living. The home boasts huge walls of glass that open the residence to lush landscaping and private outdoor spaces, while an expansive central skylight floods both levels with natural light. The home’s generously proportioned spaces include 5 bedrooms, all ensuite, and 6 spa-like bathrooms over two levels that are richly detailed with Calacatta marble, Albertini Italian doors, zebra wood, and other ultra high-end materials. The upper level features a spacious living area with a modern glass fireplace, vaulted ceilings, temperature-controlled wine wall, and a chef’s dream Bulthaup kitchen with stainless steel Miele appliances, Wolf range and a stainless steel pantry with a Dacor wine station. The kitchen flows seamlessly to the home’s outdoor oceanside oasis, complete with a brand new glass fire pit, outdoor shower, outdoor kitchen with built-in Viking grill, ice maker, refrigerator, Kalamazoo pizza oven, and sparkling pool and spa accessible directly from the master suite. The extravagant lower level is accessed via a dramatic floating staircase and leads to a full bar, home theater, gaming space, incredibly spacious and luxurious home office center complete with a full bath, glass-encased commercial wine cellar and an outdoor courtyard with a one-story waterfall. The home also offers tons of storage space throughout, a 3-car garage with epoxy flooring, effortless home security, and state-of-the-art Crestron technology to ease and automate practically every amenity and process imaginable. Located on a third of an acre, this spectacular residence is one of just 13 private homes at the resort with ownership privileges that include access to the Montage concierge, housekeeping, and room service, delivering a true resort-like living experience. Encompassing all of this, while just a few steps away from crystal clear Pacific Ocean waters, there is truly no better location in Orange County. Rarely do location, design, and such endless amenities align so comprehensively.

This is the home one dreams of but never expects to find in the real world. This perfect oceanfront setting is complemented by a residence of exquisite style. Never to be replicated under current building restrictions, the villa is carefully positioned into the site just above the water’s edge. It takes advantage of the grandfathered position of its predecessor and as such, rests comfortably on the site as if it was always meant to be. The result is a unique relationship between the interiors and the vistas of the rugged coastline, azure waters, and sunsets that is simply unequalled on this coast. Nearly 7,000 square feet of living area was painstakingly designed by the esteemed firm of Tichenor & Thorp in a coastal Italian style. It takes full advantage of the scintillating and experiential sensory opportunities of the setting including the ocean breezes, sounds of the crashing waves, and the golden light that bathes the house throughout the day. The interiors are refined and comfortable, with each room carefully layered by a studied eye with antique materials and exceptional craftsmanship. The result is both harmonious and elegant. The house features a flowing, open, and eminently livable floor plan where one gracious room leads, uninterrupted, to the next. French doors open from every major room to seaside terraces and mature European gardens all cascading toward the shore. Antique inlaid garden walls dating back over 100 years create outdoor rooms, overlooks, and guide a private path to the sand below. The primary suite is situated on the top floor and enjoys a majestic positioning. It includes a private view terrace, a Moroccan themed bath, and ample closet + dressing area. Another ocean view suite shares this floor. The main level includes the living room, which adjoins the paneled family room. The family room leads in one direction to the bar, guest bath, and main guest suite. In the other direction, it leads to the formal dining room, immense kitchen, and a sea view morning room. A large view terrace on this level is complemented by a fireplace and offers a wonderful setting for entertaining and dining. The lowest level functions as a complete ‘guest house’. Carefully positioned terraces and overlooks are sculpted into the bluff and adorned with colorful and flourishing gardens. The opportunities for living and entertaining here are beyond compare, yet it retains a luxurious ambiance and extraordinary privacy. In a word, this home is “perfection”.

Proof that you can have it all. Just above the waves and sandy beach, 1165 Gaviota sits in a perfect location with all the wonder of oceanfront living on one side of the property and the delights of storied Laguna Beach at your doorstep on the other. Newly constructed and stunningly rendered from the plans of renowned C. J. Light Associates and masterfully executed by Robinson Builders, Inc. - Bill Robinson, the residence will be delivered to the new owner furnished by acclaimed designer Michael Fullen. Sophisticated yet casual and welcoming, the vibe is California coastal with a little bit of Laguna twist. The main living level is accessed through a private courtyard beautifully hardscaped with Pennsylvania Bluestone, which features an outdoor kitchen and entertainment venue. The formal entry welcomes one into a great room concept kitchen and living area centered on the panoramic vista of the ocean, Catalina, and coastline views. Retractable Reveal doors form a wall of glass that opens to two generously sized decks above the crashing surf. No expense has been spared in this ultra-luxe appointed residence. The main house offers four (potentially five) bedrooms and four full bathrooms plus powder room as well as laundry with dual washers and dryers. The detached guest suite offers a bedroom, living space, kitchenette, and private laundry. The rooftop deck, extremely rare for an oceanfront Laguna home, offers a second outdoor dining option with dumbwaiter access to the main kitchen level. The entire property features SMART home technology utilizing top-of-the-line Crestron Home Automation System. It is powered by solar energy with battery backup. Configured to function as a primary residence, but with the convenience to 'button up' as a vacation home. Few are able to own on this rarefied oceanfront stretch of the California Riviera.

9 Lagunita is a manifestation of boundless creativity, and privacy, situated on the best beach in all of Laguna.... This property could never be recreated or built today, truly a one-of-a-kind Ocean Front within your own private gated street. Located on Victory beach this property is completely open on all four sides with privacy like no other oceanfront you have seen.... Not only is the property private but you have your own private entry gate to your street that only services your home and one other used as a 2nd vacation property.... You will be unable to find another oceanfront property in Laguna Beach that has more to offer, while also checking all the boxes.... Over 6500+ square feet of decadent interiors that host 6 bedrooms, 6.5 baths, a gym, office, and beach-ready area featuring an outdoor shower and dog wash, direct access to the sand, beach, and ocean.... Enjoys unparalleled views of breaking waves, Catalina Island, and sunsets.... The outdoor living space and a massive backyard with mature trees and landscaping throughout are not believable.... When you're walking this property, you will continue to ask yourself how this can exist here in Laguna... There is no other Ocean front in Orange Country that can compete with all this has to offer.... The photos are great, but this property is all about the feel and experience while being there... This is The Last One, there is no more after this one....

Beautiful Ocean View Contemporary home located in one of Laguna's premiere close to beach neighborhoods. Perfectly situated on highly desirable and quiet cul-de-sac Marilyn Dr, this gorgeous Tim Nicol's designed residence is an entertainers paradise. Primary bedroom suite situated on the second level with expansive Ocean and Catalina Island views and generous attached private deck to take the afternoon sunsets. 3 additional guest bedrooms (one currently being used as a combo media/bedroom) are situated on the ground level offering easy access to the front and back outdoor living areas. Perfectly appointed separate 3 work station office mezzanine. Expansive open concept chefs kitchen, dining and living room are surrounded by walls of glass doors creating seamless transition between nature and dwelling space. Lush tropical foliage surrounds ultra private back yard, large salt water pool and spa, and multiple lounge areas. Private front yard outdoor living space with built in fire pit, dining area and gorgeous ocean views. Easy access in minutes to Montage Resort and Spa, Groceries, and Laguna's finest most sought after beaches and Cove's. A place of peace and tranquility to come live the dream in beautiful Laguna Beach.

OCEAN VIEWS FROM THE PEFECT RETREAT IN PARADISE GARDEN  If you like a garden you would love living here! Custom coastal villa in South Laguna Beach is perfectly situated on a large lot with a beautiful garden.  The property has been remodeled throughout and meticulously maintained, offering all the charm, style and comfort you could ask for. With its large lot and quiet location, the home combines privacy and modern comfort. As you enter through a modern teak gate into an expansive and beautiful garden, you come upon a stunning stone sculpture, mature trees and landscaping with plenty of space to entertain or relax and enjoy the fire pit, Balinese gazebo and coastal breezes. The interior of the home is filled with an abundance of natural light and its versatile floor plan with 4 bedrooms now one used as an office, 2.5 baths suitable for many life styles. Inside the home, you will also enjoy a bright gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz counter tops with an adjacent outdoor deck offering you and your guests ocean views with sunsets over Catalina Island. The home also features high ceilings, new sliding doors, new windows, Maple hardwood floors, generous storage space, a large 3 car garage and approved plans for a spa in the backyard also an outdoor shower, when you are coming from the beach. Enjoy close proximity to award-winning schools, hiking & biking trails, fine dining and shopping, the world-famous Montage Resort and beautiful beaches just a half mile away. With its unique combination of coastal charm, modern amenities, perfect garden, ocean views and total privacy in a convenient location, this stunning home presents a rare opportunity you won't want to miss. By the way the master bathroom has heated floors!! OFFERED at $2,995,000. Very close to the Beach!

Fantastic forever views from this hilltop perch. Two car garage plus a large driveway. Steps down to the entry and living area with a leaded glass entry., Open floor plan with open beamed ceiling and windows all across the back to capture the ocean views.   Beautiful great room with fireplace and sliding doors to the wrap around balcony. Spacious dining area and corner breakfast room also enjoy the ocean panorama. Cozy kitchen, bonus room.

Located on a large corner lot, this completely upgraded and remodeled, ocean view home provides spacious entertaining areas, an open floorplan, and spectacular views from both levels. Highlighted by vaulted beamed ceilings, all new dual pane windows, new flooring, and accented with unique use of natural elements and organic lighting. The kitchen supplies an oversized island with seating; premier appliances and fixtures; abundant cabinetry; a paneled Thermador refrigerator, dishwasher, gas range and built-in microwave. The spacious primary suite boasts a large walk-in closet and bathroom replete with huge walk-in quartz marble shower, dual sinks. The downstairs boasts a large formal entryway, direct access to the oversized garage, and large guest bedrooms with ultimate privacy and a full bathroom. Live the Laguna Village Lifestyle with views throughout & proximity to the famed shopping, dining & world-class beaches.

Perched atop a private peninsula above the Pacific Ocean is this one-of-a-kind Mediterranean-style estate that embodies luxurious beach living.  Showcasing a unique location and 300-degree panoramic white-water and beach views.  Just beyond the gated driveway, a stone paver motor court with vehicle turnstiles allow easy entry and exit to the property.  Boasting approximately 4,800 square feet and spanning three levels, this premier Landmark home sits adjacent to Table Rock Beach, one of Laguna Beach’s most prized locales, and affords complete privacy to its owners and guests.  Featuring four-bedroom suites, great room, dining room, and bonus room.  You may never want to leave the master suite, which is nothing less than extraordinary.  There are balconies on each level that showcase some of the most stunning coastal vistas Orange County has to offer.  The lower-level balcony is ideal for small gatherings or extravagant parties featuring a custom slate and granite bar.  Details include a security system, high tech enhancements & an exterior automated staircase allowing you to escape to the rocks below.  Ideally located along the coast, Laguna Beach offers its residents the quintessential Southern California beach lifestyle.

Situated just minutes from the prestigious Montage Laguna Beach resort and less than a mile from some of the most scenic and secluded beaches in Southern California is this unparalleled estate. Displaying spectacular articulation of light, space, and fine design, set amid 12 unobstructed acres of native California landscape, this thoughtfully constructed estate property is enveloped by breathtaking views of the Pacific creating a harmonious connection between its refined interiors and the surrounding environment. The epitome of luxuriant California living wonderfully scaled spaces open to expansive terraces, a sparkling resort-like pool, and entertaining veranda. Every consideration was accounted for when composing this sophisticated property with the leading technological advancements in home automation; a multi-million-dollar fire suppression system; a state-of-the-art theater, facilities for multiple fitness activities, five primary-like bedrooms with en suite baths, a myriad formal and informal rooms for living and hosting guests; and interiors graced with the vision and finish selection of an Architectural Digest Top 100 designer. One of the region's most significant architectural presentations. The property's intrinsic benefits of arguably equal value have optimal proximity to the area's finest amenities while offering abundant open space, and nonpareil privacy, all affording a lifestyle beyond compare.

This newly constructed, highly designed home is the unicorn that you have been looking for in Crescent Bay. This incredible opportunity to acquire a masterpiece just steps away from one of the most iconic beaches in Orange County. Exceptional 180 degree views of the Laguna Beach shoreline, Catalina Island, and city lights with Mesmerizing sunset views. This timeless contemporary coastal beach house with its open concept living space optimizes the abundant natural light. Thoughtfully chosen finishes such as Imported Cristillo-Quartzite counters tops that are both intriguing and tranquil. Sub-Zero Refrigeration package including wolf range, built-in Coffee Maker, and Microwave. Custom cabinetry throughout with imported custom hardware. Have your morning coffee off of your primary bedroom's private glass railed balcony, while enjoying the sight and sounds of the ocean breeze. En suite bathroom that is the epitome of luxury. This soft contemporary home design with the highest quality craftsmanship and materials is brought to life by the renowned developer James Dunn. This is the most spectacular one-of-a-kind Beach home. Walkable location with easy access to upscale restaurants, chic boutiques, and art galleries. Parking for up to 6 cars! Short walk to all 5 beach coves of North Laguna, Crescent Bay, Heisler Park, Main Beach and minutes from all the amenities that Newport has to offer as well. Come make your unicorn dream, your reality.

Live the ultimate Laguna Beach experience at this gorgeous 1929 cottage above Woods Cove, where panoramic ocean, Catalina Island, city-light and sunset views provide a captivating show that is different every day. Nestled on a hillside, the terraced property features two distinct levels, each with its own kitchen and living area, making it ideal as a duplex for potential income opportunities. Zoned R3, the residence can also be used as one home, with living suites on each level. Combined, both levels offer a total of three bedrooms and two baths. The upper floor is open and airy, featuring vaulted open-beam wood ceilings,  wraparound deck that’s perfect for dining and entertaining, a great room with original brick fireplace, and a sun room that can be a studio, office or den. Upgrades abound in the remodeled kitchen, complete with skylights, a farmhouse sink, open shelving, butcher-block countertops and a Wolf range. Original wood flooring and white board-and-batten walls enhance the cottage vibe on both levels, with freestanding tubs showcased in bathrooms and numerous windows and French doors featured throughout. The lower level opens to an enchanting front yard with beautiful gardens, a towering Norfolk Island Pine, and stone patios and pathways. A detached two-car garage is featured on the property, which can be expanded, reimagined or simply enjoyed as is. Laguna’s famous beaches, coves, parks, restaurants, shops and galleries are all merely minutes from home.

Very rarely are sizeable, oceanfront "promontory" parcels offered for sale in Laguna Beach.  Perhaps there are only six promontory parcels in town...and, few are as large as this double-plus parcel.  Particularly worth noting too, this landmark contemporary home has gated steps to its privately owned sandy beach and its secured cabana with a kitchenette and bathroom.   Although the home was built by its original owners in the 1959-65 timeframe, the current owners, who are only the second owners, have beautifully updated and maintained this home since purchasing it approximately 35 years ago.  The uniqueness continues...most likely, this is the only Laguna Beach home with a sturdily constructed steel and concrete "safe room."  Living on this extra large promontory parcel, you will love the mesmerizing surf and the spectacular panoramic whitewater ocean views...spanning from the Palos Verdes Peninsula to San Diego's Coronado Island.  Yes, without a doubt, this is truly a once in a lifetime opportunity........The home is fully furnished and also available for a 31-day rental at $42,500.

Enjoy some of the best views Laguna Beach has to offer. Completely unobstructed west facing views overlooking the sand and crashing waves at Thousand Steps Beach and full Catalina Island views. Home includes private gated access from Point Place to the world-renowned beach below. Meticulously maintained home conveniently located on the ocean side of Pacific Coast Highway. This updated four bedroom home boasts an open and sensible floor plan, with the entry level including a main floor bedroom and bathroom, living and dining rooms, as well as a open and light-filled kitchen with newer stainless steel appliances and a step-in pantry. The Master Suite enjoys it's own separate ocean view deck, in addition to ample storage in the walk-in closet and a luxuriously appointed bathroom with spa tub. Finally at the upper level, you'll find an amazing combination of indoor/outdoor living, perfect for entertaining gatherings both large and intimate. The large attached deck provides dramatic and expansive views, and the adjacent living room serves as a perfect retreat, with its wet bar, cozy fireplace, and built-in media cabinet. Ample parking is provided, from both an attached direct-access two car garage with additional storage space, as well as a carport that can accommodate two additional vehicles.

Come for the Amazing Views and exquisite Laguna Beach lifestyle!  This property is absolutely gorgeous & the lowest priced single family home with 'Guest' quarters in Laguna Beach!    Also known as ADU, Casita, Granny-Flat, Rental Unit, Guest House - whatever you choose to call it, & however you’d plan to use it, you’ll DEFINITELY want to see it! This beautiful Coast Royal home features some of the best views in Laguna Beach! Custom wood framed French doors leading to five RECENTLY TREATED stunning IPE wood decks, all ocean facing allows for EXTENSIVE outdoor living & entertaining areas!  Granadillo wood floors in all bedrooms & downstairs hall!  Modern stone flooring in living room, dining room, entry & kitchen areas.  Enjoy the gaze of the beautiful Pacific Ocean from your modern kitchen complete with custom imported Italian cabinets and fixtures onto the stunning sea view.  Your gourmet kitchen includes a 6 Burner Viking Professional Stove, oven and microwave.  Wired for surround sound Venetian plaster in living room and dining room have soaring 20' ceilings, perfect to display your impressive art collection. The guest/granny flat has 2 decks with ocean view of its own!  It has a complete kitchen, bath and two bedrooms. [one is currently used as an office.]  There is an existing guest/granny flat [ADU1] and there is a 1300 sq ft partially finished basement perfect for an additional ADU, yes that would make two!  That space would also make an exquisite Yoga studio, wine cellar or whatever you need a large extra space for!   Tankless Noritz hot water heater in main house.  The ADU house has its own hot water heater, thermostat and laundry facilities!  Commercial grade garage doors or the fully renovated 3 car garage with built in custom cabinets & epoxy floors.  This is a fantastic opportunity, investment property, family compound, artist retreat or a fabulous home! ...not a cliff hanger! There is a lovely backyard garden. Featuring a large garden with fruit trees!  Must see to fully appreciate this gorgeous South Laguna Beach, very private property, minutes from some of the best beaches in the world! Close to restaurants, shopping hiking trails and more! "Laguna Beach, a seaside artist village and resort destination in Orange County, California, has been selected as one of the cleanest beaches in America."  According to a recent study of US beaches.  The views  are actually better in person!!  Even if you have already seen this it is worth seeing again!!

This private home nestled amongst lush, beautiful landscaping and a calm, quiet, cul-de-sac location calling to you from lovely Laguna Village, only steps away from the beach and a variety of dining and shopping attractions. The appealing, Ready for move in  property offers two parking spots. With its alluring views and tropical-getaway yard, this treasure shines with investment potential and is a great opportunity to build a larger home . Currently used as a 2/1 and a separate studio.

Views that are both brilliant and beguiling; exclusive, secluded, and gated; one of the most sought-after private oceanfront communities in coastal Southern California. This exceptional residence, in this idyllic collection of homes is perched on a nearly 9,000 square-foot parcel. Balanced architectural elements and rich interiors evoke a refined, yet relaxed experience at every turn. The primary rooms presenting elegant and comfortable living, dining, and entertaining; as well as the gym, four bedrooms and four baths are replete with superb finish and detail. An impressive selection of appointments and materials were employed – an abundance of French White Oak, Travertine, and imported stones; two levels of walls of glass and bi-folding glass doors; rich metal and wood cladding; custom millwork; artisan-crafted lighting; spa-like bath features; the finest appliances including Miele, Thermador, Bosch, and SubZero; and Lutron Radio Ra2 home technology. The exterior surround and lush grounds envelop the property with mature foliage, fruit trees, and specimen plants. Each of the two arced terraces create a harmonious connection with the serene natural setting and sublime views of the Pacific. The ground-level terrace leads to a meandering tiered garden, while the second level is fashioned with a sun-drenched veranda, fully equipped outdoor kitchen, and a luminous crescent pool ‘floating’ above spectacular coastline vistas. A complement to any lifestyle, this remarkable offering affords an opportunity beyond compare.

In the heart of Laguna Beach this fully remodeled home is in an amazing location. Towards the end of the street, the home sits very high on the street to allow unobstructed views. With direct access to Victoria Beach, this is a dream home! Entering through the front door, there are the two guest bedrooms at the far end of the home to allow panoramic ocean views, city views, and neighborhood views. The full guest bathroom has been fully designed and remodeled. The upper level of the home is a sight to see. With an open concept, the Kitchen opens up directly to the Dining Room and Family room. The Balcony has direct access from the Family Room, the views allows you to see in all directions. The Kitchen has new quartz countertops, brand new stainless steel appliances, new white cabinets, and hillside & Catalina views. The Master Bedroom has an amazing view and is very large with a remodeled bathroom. The downstairs Bonus Room features a cozy, newly designed fireplace, and door doors that exit into the back yard. There is a detached structure in the backyard that can be used as a gym, office, or play room. This is an amazing opportunity to own a home with a detached structure in the backyard. The two car garage has newly epoxy flooring. This is a home that boast the most amazing views that Laguna Beach has to offer. This is close to the world famous beaches of Laguna Beach, restaurants, shops, and stores. This is truly a must see. Welcome Home.

Beautifully updated and bursting with coastal charm, this 1926-built Laguna Beach cottage in the highly coveted Woods Cove neighborhood is ready for you to move in and relax! A meticulously crafted clapboard façade, white picket fencing, and lush landscaping entice you to check out what lies beyond the cozy, covered porch of “The Mermaid House.” Inside, discover a bright, seamlessly connected interior that blends modern functionality and old-world character, from the beamed ceilings to the original hardwood flooring. In the fireplace-warmed living room, built-in shelving houses your entertainment unit and prized book collection while a sliding ladder allows you to access the 100-sq ft sleeping loft.  Whip up your favorite dishes in the kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, gorgeous cabinetry, and gleaming countertops extending to the pendant-lit breakfast bar. A tastefully tiled shared bath with a classic claw-foot tub accommodates your comfortable private retreats. Outside, soak up the fresh air and ocean breezes on the sun-drenched patio that’s perfect for weekend gatherings or al fresco meals. An unbeatable location puts you just 3 blocks from the beach and mere moments from shopping, dining, and entertainment. What’s more, solar panels help you save on utilities, and the property is listed on the Laguna Beach Historical Registry as “C” rated. Let your real estate dreams come true by taking a tour today!

Opportunity knocks in Laguna Beach’s desirable Top of the World community! Located on the quiet street of Old Top of the World Drive and just down the block from the award-winning Top of the World Elementary School. This mid-century modern home was designed and built oriented to maximize the beautiful canyon and city-light views, as well as peek-a-boo ocean views. Residents of the community enjoy flat streets, plenty of parking, and close proximity to TOW Elementary, Thurston Middle School, Alta Laguna Park, tennis courts, as well as hiking and biking trails. Laguna’s postcard-perfect beaches and its rich blend of shops and restaurants await only moments down the hill. A split floor plan opens to the backyard through the formal living and dining rooms, and a family room that flows directly into a large kitchen. Discover a garage with laundry facilities and an oversized storage area. Presenting sweeping canyon views, the private backyard hosts a patio with a hot-tub, custom landscaping, and it is surrounded by a variety of mature fruit trees. Immaculately maintained, the home is ready to move in and enjoy it as is, and offers the potential to remodel into the home of your dreams.

Welcome home to this remodeled coastal oasis in scenic Arch Beach Heights. Panoramic ocean, Catalina Island sunsets and coast views spanning up the north coastline. 1993 built with a comfortable floor plan and direct garage access. Three bedrooms on the entry level and a spacious open living level upstairs. Warmly toned natural lighting provided by skylights, windows and French doors throughout. Remodeled stylings inclusive of Honed granite, Ann Sacks tile, Italian marble & Mosaic finish work. Hardwood flooring in all rooms, new carpet on stairwells. Chef’s kitchen with large center island great for gatherings with bar seating and adjacent full size dining room. Stainless steel appliances - gas range, new dishwasher, refrigerator/freezer and separate beverage refrigeration. Plentiful storage through the custom cabinetry with new paint and stainless pulls. The kitchen & dining space look onto ocean peeks and privacy palm & hedge landscapes. The open living room boasts ocean views from every angle, beautiful wood built in entertainment unit & shelving, recessed surround sound speakers, remodeled gas fireplace with Italian plaster surround and stone hearth. Home has been wired with CAT5 throughout, high end speaker wiring in dining, living and master. The master suite is spacious in size with walk-in closet, remodeled gas fireplace, doors to deck and luxurious bathroom with separate tub, shower, pedestal sink. All bedroom closets have been outfitted with custom organizers. The second bathroom has tub/shower combination. Additional amenities of half bath on living level, separate laundry and storage throughout. Outdoors enjoy three decks and a private rear patio surrounded by greenery. Two car garage with epoxy flooring, storage cabinetry and electric outlet capable for car charging. Just blocks to Moulton Meadows park with tennis, basketball courts, tot lot, grassy field, walking paths and Aliso & Wood Canyon Wilderness area great for hiking, biking & taking in city vistas. Right down the hill find the best in beaches, restaurants and quick access to downtown.

Nestled on one of the largest parcels in Three Arch Bay, this oceanfront home showcases breathtaking views of Whale Rock, the Pacific Ocean and Catalina Island.  Ideally situated at the north end of the cove, this home offers exceptional views of the spectacular beach below. A wonderfully planned home built with family living in mind, 24 S La Senda boasts oversized living spaces for entertaining and time well spent with those you love. Completely rebuilt in 1984, this incredible home has 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms and a beautiful home office with spectacular views of the cliffs of Three Arch.  A well planned kitchen with counter dining and a center island, Sub Zero refrigeration and a chef's gas range with copper trimmed hood this kitchen is made for large parties! A large Butler's Pantry and enormous laundry and sewing room complete this service area. Venture outside to the expansive entertaining decks and ample yard space perched just above the private beaches that make this neighborhood so special. A side gate in the backyard offers the perfect escape down to the beach. Three Arch Bay is one of Southern California‘s most coveted private waterfront communities. Featuring a quarter mile long stretch of pristine white sandy beach, private coves, 24-hour gated security, kids play area, clubhouse and tennis courts.

Jaw dropping views of the Ocean and Coastline await you at this very private and secluded Ocean Front duplex on the sand in Downtown Laguna Beach! Enjoy forever views of Main Beach from the 60 foot long balconies or step down to the sand via your private beach access and go for a relaxing swim in the Pacific. The main residence is a beautifully appointed four bedroom, two bath home. The gourmet kitchen includes quartz counter tops, and Viking and Bosch appliances. Often, the most special of homes are those architects design as their own. Originally built by architect Terry Mechling (associate of renowned residential architect Fred Briggs), this modern masterpiece retains much of its original power and nuance thanks to the careful stewardship of the current architect owner. Most noticeable are the dynamic lines, meticulous and thoughtful placement of large windows framing the vast canyon views, and the quality of the light drawn in throughout the home. The floorplan is functional and well planned – the entry level holds a living room with a massive view window and vaulted ceilings, an elevated oak-floored area for dining or conservatory, a kitchen abundant with glowing woods and modern appliances, and a view deck with a unique flying beam that beautifully frames the sky above. A stunning wood and sculpted-steel curving staircase provides a glorious entry to the middle bedroom level. A wide gallery hall links the bedrooms and exits to an oversized covered terrace – perfect for an outdoor California room. Another graceful, custom-crafted staircase leads to the lowest level – an amazing large bonus space that could serve as office, media room, bedroom, or studio. Throughout the home, the windows bring the outdoors inside and the light is always at play across the day. Updates (such as the newer primary bath) are considered and careful, respectful of the design integrity of the original home. Located in picturesque and peaceful Bluebird Canyon, the home is just minutes from Laguna’s beaches and shops. Ample parking is on-site – a two car garage (complete with a canyon view picture window) enters the home adjacent to the kitchen, while the drive provides space for three to four more vehicles. Special homes are rare – 1369 Bluebird Canyon Drive is just that - a special, architectural gem.

The main-level kitchen, with media and breakfast rooms adjacent, plays exotic woods against high-end hard surfaces to create a stunning and functional heart of the home. Secondary bedrooms are on the entry level, nicely separated from the primary suite. During the day, the home is awash in light. At night, the custom lighting adds nuance and drama to the home while the city lights come alive below. A custom stainless steel art fountain welcomes you to the home, and an additional unique water feature provides a focal point for one of the many outdoor spaces. This is not the ordinary – 794 Summit Drive is an extraordinary ocean view retreat that delights at every turn.

Villa Azul is a development opportunity located in the coastal community of Laguna Beach with approved plans and currently under construction. This enchanting hillside site reveals commanding views of the Pacific Ocean with some of the most pristine beaches and rocky coves located just minutes away. Designed by world-renowned Horst Architects, the plans include an approx. 3,000 sq. ft. main house along with an approx. 700 sq. ft. detached Casita. The main level features a formal entry, chef’s kitchen, dining and family rooms, and a 2-car garage. This level opens up to a covered outdoor area, perfect for entertaining. The lower level of the main house contains the private, sleeping spaces, including a large owner’s suite boasting a bathing area with breathtaking views of the ocean and a spacious walk-in closet. All of the rooms at this level have ocean views and open to the private pool deck enjoying a 42ft. long infinity edge lap pool. The Casita is located beneath the pool, with living and sleeping spaces, opening to a vast garden. The principal materials being used include ocean silver travertine, marine-grade cedar, concrete, glass, and steel – all alluding to the natural colors and textures abundant along the coastline.
